hello: Hello ${name} and welcome! Choose in the bottom, what are you going to do:
getToken: Send me a token for your new bot:
getHelloMessage: Send me a hello-message, that bot will send at start. It shouldn't be longer, than 3000 characters.
tokenReady: Thank you! Your bot is ready to work
notToken: That's not valid token. Please, send correct token in format 992423853:AAFwE1VyujhzfhtJlO47ulOcNYZsVPLbytY
choose: Please first choose, whom should I send message
noBots: You don't have any bots now, but you can connect them, using button in the bottom.
yourBots: Here are all your connected bots. Choose the needed one:
manageBot: Choose, what are going to do with bot @${botUsername}:
editToken: Send me a new token for your bot @${botUsername}:
